infobox.Japanese title:: 鹿威しが響く刻  (Shishi-odoshi ga Hibiku Toki)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Wataru Takagi  Kazunobu Chiba
infobox.Animation director:: Zi Dengjia  Michitaka Yamamoto  Yukari Kamiaka
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Rei Masunaga (sub-character)  Hiroshi Ogawa (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Kazuyuki Okitsu as Hideaki Okawa  Ryuichi Kijima as Takeru Motomiya  Yu Hayashi as Toshiki Morita  Atsushi Miyauchi as Masato Kijima  Osamu Hosoi as Jun Komada  Yurina Watanabe as Lady

sections.Trivia: - The "Urasawada School" (裏沢田家 ,Ura-Sawada-ke?) of traditional tea ceremony is a reference to the real-life "Urasenke School" (裏千家 ,Ura-sen-ke?) of tea ceremony and a pun on screenplay writer Yoshio Urasawa's name.
